sub_title: Product Master Data Specialist at Velux Commercial
summary: Master Data Management | Project Management | SAP | EXACT | NAVISION

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for Master Data Management within ERP software: Microsoft Dynamics Navision, for the countries: The Netherlands, Belgium, United Kingdom, Norway and Denmark.
•	Determine item design and way of working within NAV.
•	Creation and maintenance of items, work centers, routings and production bom’s.
•	Creation and maintenance of general item data; f.e. mandatory fields, extended text.  
•	Yearly or biennial pricing updates.
- Member of an international team for master data management. In this role, primary contact person for all master data related questions/issues (troubleshooter) for the countries: The Netherlands, Belgium, United Kingdom, Norway and Denmark.
- Prepare cost price calculations for various purposes:  (sales) prices enquiries, for new to be launched products (R&D) or Special Products (exceptions on the standard assortment).
- Actively involved in projects in case of launching new products (item/WoW design).
- Develop and maintain KPI reports (production related).
- Develop, maintain and analyze MRP settings.
profile_positions.title: Product Master Data Specialist

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for Short- and midterm planning for part of the product portfolio for flower seeds.
- Develop and maintain a balanced plan for blending, processing and packing for commercial flower seeds in line with global demand. Adjust and communicate updated plans as required in case of changes to demand or supply availability.
-  Understand Regional and Inter-Regional market requirements and manage the physical flows through the processing-, testing- and packing plant in line with the demand plan.
- Execute the Regional allocations plans in cooperation with the Global Crop Planner and Internal Order Manager.
- Responsible for optimal inventory management, manage the inventory classification process at plant level, to ensure inventory is reflected accurately in the SAP system with regards to usable and not usable status. Maintain upgrade/usability of stocks in local plants to minimize potential write offs.
- Ensure communication and coordination with Global Crop Planners, other Processing and Logistics Planners and Site Capacity Planners to ensure optimal use of work centers within assets.
- Maintain and coordinate local planning- and master data.
- Develop and maintain KPI reports.
-  Primary contact for Sales & Marketing, Supply chain and the plant. Identify supply constraints and manage short term amendments/ imbalances in the plans to secure customer promise dates.
profile_positions.title: Processing & Logistics Planner

profile_positions.description:
- Manage the planning, ordering and delivery of raw materials, products used within the production of concrete elements to ensure on-time delivery across all levels of the organization.
- Closely monitor inventory levels of assigned raw materials and products to maximize inventory turns and minimize obsolete stock.
- Work closely with Purchase department to ensure the suppliers have committed to the schedules, and where necessary work together to create and implement achievable recovery plans.
- Pro-actively identifying, escalate and address risks to production requirements, supplier lead times, schedule stability, planned inventory levels and warehousing capacities.
-  Develop, maintain and analyze MRP settings to deliver the correct inventory levels to Voorbij Prefab Beton’s Operations.
- Maintain and coordinate master data to develop a consistent item database.
- As Key user contribute to implement Invoicing and E-procurement  program: 20/20 Vision.
- Temporary replacement of the logistics manager.
profile_positions.title: Material Planner

profile_positions.description:
-  Responsible for short- and midterm planning for various product lines. Coordinate and direct several shop floor production activities to ensure on time delivery. 
- Continuously drive improvements on existing process in close cooperation with production employees, production manager, logistical department and suppliers. As team member contribute to implement LEAN within the production; used toos f.e. VSM (Value Stream Mapping), 5’s and KANBAN. Results: lead time reduction, improved delivery reliability and stock reduction. 
- Use MRP to balance demand and supply, creating a production plan that satisfies the combined requirements of production, development and any other sources, keeping inventory within approved limits.
-  Develop, maintain and analyze MRP settings to deliver the correct inventory levels to Voorbij Prefab Beton’s Operations.
- As Key user contribute to implement Exact Globe ERP software.
profile_positions.title: Production Planner
